text: Ruoth marito piny nyaka wuog e laru oko midhiyo e ot maduongʼ manie dhorangach ma yo wuok chiengʼ mi ochungʼ e bath sirni mag dhorangajno. E kindeno jodolo notimne misengini miwangʼo pep kod mag lalruok. Nyaka olam Nyasaye kochungʼ e bath siro mar rangach eka owuog odhi oko, to rangach nyaka sik koyaw nyaka piny imre.
